content.heading: <track> Tag
paragraphs: The <track> tag specifies text tracks for media elements.

Example: <video controls>
  <source src="movie.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  <track src="subtitles_en.vtt" kind="subtitles" srclang="en" label="English">
</video>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used for subtitles, captions, or descriptions in WebVTT (.vtt) format.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 23, Edge 10, Firefox 31, Safari 6, Opera 12.1.
